songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’ma play today
Catch a play then go and play
How you wanna play today?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’m on my own, and I’m alone
I just threw this shit up and it’s all gone
But I’m so on, yeah I’m ah-on
How you wanna play? How you wanna play?

[Verse 1]
Ok, how you wanna play today?
All you niggas fake
I’ma drop like 80k, Audemar Piguet
Then the Audemar with diamonds, I ain’t have to change
Then the AP diamonds, I ain’t rearrange it
Real nigga get it, real nigga maintain it
Choke a bitch out, yeah my bitches get strangled
I don’t even play, put it in their face
Real nigga with me we gon’ get it everyday
Flew from VA to LA, LA to MIA
You know how we play, club play, what’s the play?
I got a two play, flew from Vegas to the A
You know how I ball, you know how I play

[Hook]
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’ma play today
Catch a play then go and play
How you wanna play today?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’m on my own, and I’m alone
I just threw this shit up and it’s all gone
But I’m so on, yeah I’m ah-on
How you wanna play? How you wanna play?

[Verse 2]
Ok, I’m playing with money, playing with hundreds
I’m playing with exclusive shit, I’m playin’ with that new and shit
I’m playing with that Louis shit, playing with that Gucci shit
I might make a movie with, your bitch with Jacuzzi in it
Two bottles and swishers, too much liquor
Too many of these niggas not official
Uh-uh, and I told you
Getting money, I’ll fold you
Ran off, I don’t owe you
Call my phone, I don’t know you
I’m gone, they don’t have a clue
Came through, brand new

[Hook]
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’ma play today
Catch a play then go and play
How you wanna play today?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
How you wanna play?
I’m on my own, and I’m alone
I just threw this shit up and it’s all gone
But I’m so on, yeah I’m ah-on
How you wanna play? How you wanna play?
songs.title: How You Wanna Play
